description.value: Externally defined table of codes specifying a service line revenue code. These are claim codes indicating the identifying number for the product or service provided. In the US, NUBC codes generally used, see code system 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.3; more information may be found at http://www.nubc.org/become.html. The UB-04 Data Specifications Manual with the codes is available by subscription from NUBC at http://www.nubc.org/become.html, UB form locater 42.
